wikipedia_page.main: Leslie Allison Godfree (27 April 1885 – 17 November 1971) was a British male tennis player who was especially successful in doubles and mixed doubles.

response: *1921–22  Randolph Lycett (his partners were  Max Woosnam in the 1921 tournament,  James Anderson in 1922, and  Leslie Godfree)
